name: The Legend of Evil
description: Destroy all of humanity in a hyper-tactical tower-offense game that takes no prisoners (especially if they are humans).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or greater Processor: 2GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+ DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
